about_the_game:
In the enchanted world of the Middle Ages, it's a king's struggle for survival! Equipped with top-down shooter mechanics and rogue-lite elements, you must battle against increasingly challenging waves of enemy swarms.

You'll encounter different maps and various foes, engaging in a great struggle. Your chosen abilities will determine your style of combat and fate.

Features
- Automatic firing weapons and spells are available.
- Games are short-lived, lasting less than 10 minutes.
- You can choose from 4 different characters, each with unique attributes.
- There are 9 item and ability options.
- Try to survive during waves lasting 10 minutes and eliminate as many enemies as possible.
- Gain experience points by destroying enemies. Level up to choose your own special abilities between attacks!
- As the level increases, the difficulty levels of the enemies will also increase.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD CHANNEL


About the Game

In the enchanted world of the Middle Ages, it's a king's struggle for survival! Equipped with top-down shooter mechanics and rogue-lite elements, you must battle against increasingly challenging waves of enemy swarms.

You'll encounter different maps and various foes, engaging in a great struggle. Your chosen abilities will determine your style of combat and fate.

Features
- Automatic firing weapons and spells are available.
- Games are short-lived, lasting less than 10 minutes.
- You can choose from 4 different characters, each with unique attributes.
- There are 9 item and ability options.
- Try to survive during waves lasting 10 minutes and eliminate as many enemies as possible.
- Gain experience points by destroying enemies. Level up to choose your own special abilities between attacks!
- As the level increases, the difficulty levels of the enemies will also increase.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: 7 nm AMD APU Zen 2 4c/8t, 2,4-3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU, 1,0-1,6 GHz
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: 7 nm AMD APU Zen 2 4c/8t, 2,4-3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU, 1,0-1,6 GHz
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: King Must Survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD™ FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or Intel® Arc™ A380 or AMD Radeon™ R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K or AMD Ryzen™ 1300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or Intel® Arc™ A750 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: In the enchanted world of the Middle Ages, it's a king's struggle for survival! Equipped with top-down shooter mechanics and rogue-lite elements, you must battle against increasingly challenging waves of enemy swarms.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Turkish, Russian, French, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
